scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/manifest.json dist && copyfiles -u 2 src/popup/* dist/popup
scripts.build:watch: npm run clean && tsc --watch & npm run copy:watch
scripts.copy:watch: nodemon --watch src --ext html,css,json,png,svg,jpg --exec "copyfiles -u 1 src/manifest.json dist && copyfiles -u 2 src/popup/* dist/popup"
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip .
